languages.text: Вигдис докладывает, что до отбоя по всем личным воксам команды активно обсуждался ваш недавний приказ. Некоторые считают, вам не хватает твердости, иные довольны остроумным ответом. И лишь боевые команды глубоко разочарованы тем, что не смогли "хорошенько проучить космических шавок Чорда".

traits.locale_text: Вигдис докладывает, что до отбоя по всем личным воксам команды активно обсуждался ваш недавний приказ. Некоторые считают, вам не хватает твердости, иные довольны остроумным ответом. И лишь боевые команды глубоко разочарованы тем, что не смогли "хорошенько проучить космических шавок Чорды".

languages.text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."
languages.original_text: Вигдис докладывает, что до отбоя по всем личным воксам команды активно обсуждался ваш недавний приказ. Некоторые считают, вам не хватает твердости, иные довольны остроумным ответом. И лишь боевые команды глубоко разочарованы тем, что не смогли "хорошенько проучить космических шавок Чорда".

traits.locale_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being actively discussed on the crew's personal vox casters until the lights out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of the Rogue Trader, but others are happy with the cleverness of the reply. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed by not being allowed to "teach Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't forget in a hurry."

Vigdis reports that your order was being actively discussed on the crew's personal vox casters until the lights out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of the Rogue Trader, but others are happy with the cleverness of the reply. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed by not being allowed to "teach Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't forget in a hurry."

Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

languages.text: 维格迪斯报告说，在熄灯铃响之前，船员们一直在私人通讯频道热烈讨论你的命令。有些人认为你缺乏行商浪人所需的坚定态度，另一些人则为你明智的行为感到钦佩。只有战斗人员非常失望，因为他们没能得到机会“给库尔达那群太空杂种们一个难忘的教训”。
languages.original_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

traits.locale_text: 维格迪斯报告说，在熄灯铃响之前，船员们一直在私人通讯频道热烈讨论你的命令。有些人认为你缺乏行商浪人所需的坚定态度，另一些人则为你明智的行为感到钦佩。只有战斗人员非常失望，因为他们没能得到机会“给库尔达那群太空杂种们一个难忘的教训”。

languages.text: ヴィグディスの報告によると、消灯ベルが鳴るまで、クルー個人のヴォクスキャストであなたの注文についてかなり活発に議論されていたそうだ。あなたにはローグトレーダーに必要な堅忍不抜の精神が欠けていると考える者もいれば、あなたの巧みな対応に感心する者もいる。戦闘クルーだけが、「チョーダの奴らに、すぐには忘れることのできない教訓を与えてやる」という喜びを得ることができず、非常に落胆している。
languages.original_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

traits.locale_text: ヴィグディスの報告によると、消灯ベルが鳴るまで、クルー個人のヴォクスキャストであなたの注文についてかなり活発に議論されていたそうだ。あなたにはローグトレーダーに必要な堅忍不抜の精神が欠けていると考える者もいれば、あなたの巧みな対応に感心する者もいる。戦闘クルーだけが、「チョーダの奴らに、すぐには忘れることのできない教訓を与えてやる」という喜びを得ることができず、非常に落胆している。

languages.text: Vigdis informa de que tu orden se discutió activamente en los voco amplificadores personales de la tripulación hasta que se apagaron las luces. Algunos creen que careces de la firmeza necesaria para ser Comerciante Independiente, pero otros están impresionados por tu ingeniosa respuesta. Solo las unidades de combate están muy decepcionadas por no haber tenido el placer de «enseñar a los perros espaciales de Chorda una lección que no olvidarán pronto».
languages.original_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

traits.locale_text: Vigdis informa de que tu orden se discutió activamente en los voco amplificadores personales de la tripulación hasta que se apagaron las luces. Algunos creen que careces de la firmeza necesaria para ser Comerciante Independiente, pero otros están impresionados por tu ingeniosa respuesta. Solo las unidades de combate están muy decepcionadas por no haber tenido el placer de «enseñar a los perros espaciales de Chorda una lección que no olvidarán pronto».

languages.text: Vigdis berichtet, dass dein Befehl noch bis zum Ertönen der Nachtglocke Gesprächsthema unter der Crew war. Manche glauben, dir wurde die Robustheit fehlen, die {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} braucht, andere waren von deiner klugen Reaktion beeindruckt. Nur die Kampfcrews sind bitter enttäuscht, weil ihnen das Vergnügen verwehrt geblieben ist, "Chordas Weltraumaffen eine Lektion zu erteilen, die sie nicht so bald vergessen werden".
languages.original_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

traits.locale_text: Vigdis berichtet, dass dein Befehl noch bis zum Ertönen der Nachtglocke Gesprächsthema unter der Crew war. Manche glauben, dir wurde die Robustheit fehlen, die {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} braucht, andere waren von deiner klugen Reaktion beeindruckt. Nur die Kampfcrews sind bitter enttäuscht, weil ihnen das Vergnügen verwehrt geblieben ist, "Chordas Weltraumaffen eine Lektion zu erteilen, die sie nicht so bald vergessen werden".

languages.text: Vigdis vous informe que votre décision a fait l'objet de vives controverses sur les émetteurs-vox personnels de l'équipage, et ce jusqu'au signal ordonnant l'extinction des feux. Si certains vous reprochent un manque de fermeté indigne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, d'autres saluent l'intelligence de votre réaction. Seuls les escadrons d'assaut sont amèrement déçus de s'être vus privés de cette belle occasion de « donner aux bâtards à la solde de Chorda une leçon qu'ils n'auraient pas oubliée de sitôt ».
languages.original_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."

traits.locale_text: Vigdis vous informe que votre décision a fait l'objet de vives controverses sur les émetteurs-vox personnels de l'équipage, et ce jusqu'au signal ordonnant l'extinction des feux. Si certains vous reprochent un manque de fermeté indigne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, d'autres saluent l'intelligence de votre réaction. Seuls les escadrons d'assaut sont amèrement déçus de s'être vus privés de cette belle occasion de « donner aux bâtards à la solde de Chorda une leçon qu'ils n'auraient pas oubliée de sitôt ».

languages.text: Vigdis'in raporuna göre verdiğin emir, yatma vakti için çanlar çalana kadar mürettebatın kişisel voksyayarlarında yoğun bir şekilde tartışılıyordu. Kimisi bir Hür Tacirde olması gereken metanetten yoksun olduğunu düşünürken ötekileri de zekice yanıt vermenden etkilenmiş. Çatışma birlikleri ise "Chorda'nın uzay itlerine unutulmaz bir ders verme" fırsatını kaçırdıkları için son derece hayal kırıklığına uğramış.
languages.original_text: Vigdis reports that your order was being quite actively discussed on the crew's personal vox-casters until the lights-out bell. Some believe you lack the staunchness required of a Rogue Trader, but others are impressed by your clever response. Only the combat crews are bitterly disappointed, not having the pleasure of "teaching Chorda's space mongrels a lesson they won't soon forget."
